title: Apple owns apple.car domain | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Carplay]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Apple has been rumoured to be working on its own self-driving car, tipped fora 2020- release, for some time.The secretive project has supposedly been developed under the codename‘Project Titan’.
